articles.author: Reuters Inc.
articles.title: Poland to vaccinate 12-year-olds, join EU COVID certificate scheme | Saltwire - SaltWire Network
articles.description:
WARSAW (Reuters) -Poland will offer COVID-19 vaccinations to children aged 12-15 from June 7 and is also joining an EU certificate scheme to make travel easier, ministers said on Tuesday.
